1399610.name: Lonely Mountains: Downhill - Soundtrack
1399610.description:
Lonely Mountains: Downhill ASMR原声大碟

《Lonely Mountains: Downhill ASMR原声大碟》由开发团队Megagon Industries及音乐团队Syndrone联合呈现。原声大碟内收录了五个赛道的原声音效，包括游戏的环境音和单车音效。
静静地享受单车流畅滑过赛道的声音吧！
奖励模式的音效也收录其中！

Produced by: Alexander Binderer and Lukas Meinardus, Syndrone GbR
Mixed by: Alexander Binderer and Lukas Meinardus, Syndrone GbR
Mastered by: Alexander Binderer and Lukas Meinardus, Syndrone GbR
Recorded at: Megagon Industries
